name: ckan-mcp-server
description: MCP server for searching and exploring datasets on CKAN open data portals (dati.gov.it, data.gov, data.gov.uk, and more)
long_description: Connect Claude Desktop to any CKAN-based open data portal. Search datasets with full Solr query syntax, query tabular data via DataStore, explore organizations and groups, and access complete metadata. Supports all major government open data portals worldwide including Italy (dati.gov.it), United States (catalog.data.gov), Canada (open.canada.ca), United Kingdom (data.gov.uk), and the European Union (data.europa.eu).

tools.name: ckan_package_search
tools.description: Search for datasets on a CKAN server using Solr query syntax with filters, facets, and sorting

tools.name: ckan_find_relevant_datasets
tools.description: Find and rank datasets by relevance to a query using weighted field scoring

tools.name: ckan_package_show
tools.description: Get complete metadata for a specific dataset including resources, organization, and tags

tools.name: ckan_datastore_search
tools.description: Query tabular data from a CKAN DataStore resource with SQL-like filters

tools.name: ckan_datastore_search_sql
tools.description: Run SQL queries directly on a CKAN DataStore resource

tools.name: ckan_organization_list
tools.description: List all organizations on a CKAN server

tools.name: ckan_organization_show
tools.description: Get details of a specific organization including its datasets

tools.name: ckan_organization_search
tools.description: Search for organizations by name pattern

tools.name: ckan_group_list
tools.description: List all thematic groups on a CKAN server

tools.name: ckan_group_show
tools.description: Get details of a specific group

tools.name: ckan_group_search
tools.description: Search for groups by name pattern

tools.name: ckan_tag_list
tools.description: List tags from a CKAN server with counts, optionally filtered by query or substring

tools.name: ckan_status_show
tools.description: Check if a CKAN server is available and get version information

tools.name: ckan_get_mqa_quality
tools.description: Get MQA quality metrics for a dataset on dati.gov.it (accessibility, reusability, interoperability, findability, contextuality)

tools.name: ckan_get_mqa_quality_details
tools.description: Get detailed MQA quality reasons and dimension scores for a dataset on dati.gov.it
